name: Save Me! (BankShotZombies)
description:
You are trapped in a basement with yourself and a girl...and an endless onslaught of monsters. These monsters are attacking the helpless girl--the reason is unknown. You must protect this girl from these monsters with just two weapons!

Switch weapons - Scroll wheel or 1 and 2 numbers

Movement - WASD

Crouch - C

This was made for the 3-day Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam.
